headline: Disruption after rush-hour crash at busy junction
content: The crash has led to severe delays for drivers, Nottingham Travelwise said
A crash in Nottingham has shut a road and led to disruption.
Emergency services were at the scene of the crash in Alfreton Road, at the junction of Gregory Boulevard, at about 08:00 GMT on Tuesday.

Nottingham City Transport said on Tuesday morning the crash had shut Alfreton Road outbound, between Radford Boulevard and Gregory Boulevard, with it unable to serve Gregory Boulevard stops. However, it later said buses were operating on their normal route, with delays.
Nottingham Travelwise asked drivers to "take extra care if travelling through the area" and to allow additional time.
